name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Add milk and eggs, and mix until smooth.
Cook on a griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Toss with Caesar dressing.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Brown ground beef with chopped onion and garlic.
Add tomato sauce and simmer.
Mix sauce with cooked spaghetti.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 350째F.
Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder.
Add eggs and milk, and mix until smooth.
Pour into a baking pan and bake for 30 minutes.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with milk.
Pour into a heated pan.
Add cheese, ham, and bell pepper.
Fold and cook until eggs are set.

name: Chicken Sandwich
instructions: Grill chicken breast.
Toast bread slices.
Assemble sandwich with lettuce, tomato, grilled chicken, and mayonnaise.

name: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Marinate salmon with lemon, olive oil, garlic, and herbs.
Preheat grill.
Grill salmon until cooked through.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: Prepare pie crust with flour and butter.
Fill with sliced apples mixed with sugar and cinnamon.
Cover with top crust and bake until golden brown.

name: French Toast
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, cinnamon, and sugar.
Dip bread slices in the mixture.
Cook on a griddle until golden brown.

name: Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Chop vegetables.
Cook vegetables in broth until tender.
Add pasta and cook until done.

name: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 350째F.
Mash bananas and mix with sugar, eggs, and melted butter.
Add flour and baking soda, and mix until smooth.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake for 60 minutes.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook chopped onion, garlic, and ginger in a pan.
Add chicken and curry powder, and cook until chicken is done.
Add coconut milk and simmer.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion.
Mix with feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil.

name: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef in a pot.
Add chopped potatoes, carrots, and onion.
Sprinkle with flour and stir.
Add beef broth and simmer until vegetables are tender.

name: Blueberry Muffins
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F.
Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Add eggs and milk, and mix until smooth.
Fold in blueberries.
Pour into muffin tins and bake for 25 minutes.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables.
Cook garlic and ginger in a pan.
Add vegetables and soy sauce, and stir fry until tender.

name: Quiche
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F.
Beat eggs with milk.
Add cheese, spinach, and ham.
Pour into pie crust and bake for 45 minutes.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Cook garlic in butter in a pan.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Add lemon juice and parsley.
Mix with cooked pasta.
